Pretty high up there on the "easy to learn, hard to master" scale. But its also rather hard to learn.

One of the only online games where it feels like game balance doesn't BS you. The skill ceiling for aim, map knowledge, grenade usage, economy strategy, and so much more is really high. The skins are easily my favorite cosmetics in any game, and wheeling and dealing skins to try to profit can be fun all by itself. Being able to sell cosmetics is awesome and it makes buying them feel like less of a waste unlike other games where they're locked to your account. Make sure to play competitive mode as soon as it lets you and then enjoy the best esports game there is.
